definitions.definition: Opposite , contrary ; going in the opposite direction.
examples: We ate the meal in reverse order, starting with dessert and ending with the starter.
The mirror showed us a reverse view of the scene.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to engines , vehicle movement etc. moving in a direction opposite to the usual direction.
To be in the non-default position; to be set for the lesser-used route.
In which cDNA synthetization is obtained from an RNA template.

main_definition: Opposite , contrary ; going in the opposite direction. [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: Pertaining to engines , vehicle movement etc. moving in a direction opposite to the usual direction. [from 19th c.]
( rail transport , of points ) To be in the non-default position; to be set for the lesser-used route.
( genetics ) In which cDNA synthetization is obtained from an RNA template.
